issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
After importing an EBS backed instance (euca-import-instance) then creating an image from the imported instance (euca-create-image), you cannot connect to instances built from that emi.  The euca-create-image command was tested on a running image as well as a stopped EBS backed instance.

There is a hibernate ConstraintViolationException error in cloud-output.log during the euca-create-image snapshot creation:


{code:java}
2015-06-23 13:20:41  INFO | Registering image pk=emi-a838b0a6 ownerId=arn:aws:euare::357050836882:user/admin
2015-06-23 13:20:41  INFO | Starting create image task for i-6df9b862 : emi-a838b0a6
2015-06-23 13:20:48  INFO | Created snapshot snap-90b2bcc0 from volume vol-88b5f6a1 for device /dev/sda
2015-06-23 13:20:58  INFO | snapshot creating - 0%
2015-06-23 13:21:08  INFO | snapshot creating - 0%
2015-06-23 13:21:18  INFO | snapshot creating - 0%

2015-06-23 13:21:48  INFO | snapshot creating - 0%

2015-06-23 13:23:28  INFO | snapshot creating - 7%
2015-06-23 13:23:38  INFO | snapshot creating - 28%
2015-06-23 13:23:48  INFO | snapshot creating - 46%
2015-06-23 13:23:58  INFO | snapshot creating - 46%
2015-06-23 13:24:08  INFO | snapshot creating - 46%
2015-06-23 13:24:18  INFO | snapshot creating - 46%
2015-06-23 13:24:28  INFO | snapshot creating - 46%
2015-06-23 13:24:38  INFO | snapshot creating - 46%
2015-06-23 13:24:48  INFO | snapshot creating - 46%
2015-06-23 13:24:48 ERROR | com.eucalyptus.event.EventFailedException: Failed to fire event: listener=com.eucalyptus.reporting.modules.storage.SnapShotUsageEventListener event=org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could not execute statement because of: could not execute statement
2015-06-23 13:24:58  INFO | snapshot creating - 100%
2015-06-23 13:24:58  INFO | Registering image pk=emi-a838b0a6 ownerId=arn:aws:euare::357050836882:user/admin
2015-06-23 13:24:58  INFO | Image emi-a838b0a6 is available
2015-06-23 13:25:08  INFO | CreateImage is done for instance i-6df9b862; Image emi-a838b0a6 registered
2015-06-23 13:27:40  INFO | Found authorized clusters: [one-cc-1]
2015-06-23 13:27:40  INFO | Availability: one-cc-1 -> 9

[root@g-19-07 ~]# euca-describe-images emi-a838b0a6
IMAGE	emi-a838b0a6	357050836882/ubuntu2	357050836882	available	public	x86_64	machine			ebs	hvm	
BLOCKDEVICEMAPPING	EBS	/dev/sda	snap-90b2bcc0	10	true	standard	

[root@g-19-07 ~]# euca-run-instances -k keypair-1435066447 -z one -g default emi-a838b0a6
RESERVATION	r-65043a58	357050836882	default
INSTANCE	i-1ee10e09	emi-a838b0a6	10.111.30.165	10.111.30.165	pending	keypair-1435066447	0	m1.small	2015-06-23T20:27:41.060Z	one				monitoring-disabled	10.111.30.165	10.111.30.165			ebs					hvm			sg-db6f2e75			x86_64

[root@g-19-07 ~]# euca-describe-instances i-1ee10e09

fields.summary: euca-create-image completes but resulting image is not usable

comments.body: Please try to collect the instance console output during the operation.

This appears to be un-reproducible.  I have tried it on the QA shared setup and I cannot reproduce it.  The "Failed to fire event" error message below continues to be emitted in cloud-output.log which does concern me so I will open an issue for this:


{code:java}
2015-06-29 12:58:51  INFO | Registering image pk=emi-344e3a36 ownerId=arn:aws:euare::680235409094:user/admin
2015-06-29 12:58:51  INFO | Starting create image task for i-367fca15 : emi-344e3a36
2015-06-29 12:58:59  INFO | Stopping instance i-367fca15
2015-06-29 12:59:30  INFO | Created snapshot snap-666707cb from volume vol-e5b7db00 for device /dev/sda
2015-06-29 12:59:39  INFO | snapshot creating - 0%
2015-06-29 12:59:49  INFO | snapshot creating - 0%
2015-06-29 12:59:59  INFO | snapshot creating - 0%
2015-06-29 13:00:09  INFO | snapshot creating - 0%
2015-06-29 13:00:19  INFO | snapshot creating - 1%
2015-06-29 13:00:29  INFO | snapshot creating - 1%
2015-06-29 13:00:39  INFO | snapshot creating - 1%
2015-06-29 13:00:49  INFO | snapshot creating - 19%
2015-06-29 13:00:59  INFO | snapshot creating - 40%
2015-06-29 13:01:09  INFO | snapshot creating - 40%
2015-06-29 13:01:19  INFO | snapshot creating - 40%
2015-06-29 13:01:20 ERROR | com.eucalyptus.event.EventFailedException: Failed to fire event: listener=com.eucalyptus.re
porting.modules.storage.SnapShotUsageEventListener event=org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could no
t execute statement because of: could not execute statement
2015-06-29 13:01:29  INFO | snapshot creating - 100%
2015-06-29 13:01:30  INFO | Registering image pk=emi-344e3a36 ownerId=arn:aws:euare::680235409094:user/admin
2015-06-29 13:01:30  INFO | Image emi-344e3a36 is available
{code}
